original: // zab mo gcod kyi tshogs mchod bsdus pa dngos grub kyi sa bon bzhugs /
analyzed: zab mo gcod kyi tshogs mchod sdud ba dngos grub kyi sa bon bzhugs

original: rlung me thod sgyed la gnas ka p+aa lar //
analyzed: rlung me thod sgyed la gnas ka p+aa lar

original: tshogs kyi yo byad dam rdzas kun tshang zhing //
analyzed: tshogs kyi yo byad dam rdzas kun tshang zhing

original: rang rig mkha' 'gro rang lus de dang 'dres //
analyzed: rang rig mkha gro rang lus de dang dre

original: phata phata phata phatah sha rus khrag gis phyur bur gtams pa la /
analyzed: phata phata phata phatah sha rus khrag gis phyur bur gtams ba la

original: ram yam kham spros ma dag ngos 'dzin sbyangs //
analyzed: ram yam kham spros ma dag ngos dzin sbyong

original: rdzas zhu rlangs pa zla phyed rdo rje yis //
analyzed: rdzas ju rlangs ba zla phyed rdo rje yis

original: rwa la rigs lnga'i snying po bcud gsal ba'i //
analyzed: rwa la rigs lnga snying po bcud gsal ba

original: 'od zer gyis bskul 'khor 'das bdud rtsi bkug /
analyzed: d zer gyis skul khor da bdud rtsi gugs

original: yas rim gyis zhu thod pa'i bdud rtsir 'dres //
analyzed: yas rim gyis ju thod ba bdud rtsir dre

original: +aahmh'u / gnas rang bzhin rnam dag pho brang nas //
analyzed: +aahmhu gnas rang bzhin rnam dag pho brang nas

original: khyed skyabs gnas mchog dang snying rje'i mgron //
analyzed: khyed skyob gnas mchog dang snying rje mgron

original: gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: gnas dir spyan bgrang gshegs su gsol

original: tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di bzhes la //
analyzed: tshogs kyi mchod ba di bzhes la

original: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsol

original: byin rlabs thugs rje rgyun ma chad //
analyzed: byin rlabs thugs rje rgyun ma chad

original: phyi nang gnyis kyi bar chad sol //
analyzed: phyi nang gnyis kyi ba chad sol

original: ma h+aa su kha sa ma ya ho /
analyzed: ma h+aa su kha sa ma ya ho

original: g+ha na tsa kra pu tsa kha kha kh+aa hi /
analyzed: g+ha na tsa kra pu tsa kha kha kh+aa hi

original: 'khor 'das gnyis bsdus mgron rnams la //
analyzed: khor da gnyis sdud mgron rnams la

original: zhal zas tshogs gtor 'di bsngosa pas //
analyzed: zhal zas tshogs thor di bsngosa ba

original: bsngosa pa bzhin du tshim gyur cig /
analyzed: bsngosa ba bzhin du tshim gyur cig

original: bsam pa bzhin du 'grub gyur cig /
analyzed: bsam ba bzhin du grub gyur cig

original: phem / h'u h+r+aih rdo rje khros ma'i bka' nyan las byed tshogs //
analyzed: phem hu h+r+aih rdo rje khro ma bka nyan las byed tshogs

original: bka' yi pha 'bab lhag gtor 'di bzhes la //
analyzed: bka yi pha bab lhag thor di bzhes la

original: zhi rgyas dbang drag 'gugs 'dren mnan gzir sogs //
analyzed: zhi rgya dbang drag gugs bgrang gnon gzir sogs

original: ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
analyzed: ji ltar chol ba phrin las grub ba mdzod

original: ces pa'ang bka' ma'i dgongs pa bsdus nas snying sdug gi bu rat+nasa bskul ngor bi dza'i ming gis bris pa mchog thun gyi dngos grub bde blag tu 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig //
analyzed: ces ba bka ma dgongs ba sdud nas snying sdug gi bu rat+nasa skul ngor bi dza ming gis bri ba mchog thun gyi dngos grub bde blag tu grub ba rgyur gyur cig
